Starring Bert Lytell, The Right of Way is a lost The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog: The Right of Way 1920 American remade silent film directed by John Francis Dillon and distributed by Metro Pictures.Progressive Silent Film List: The Right of Way at silentera.com The AFI Catalog of Feature Films: The Right of Way The film was previously filmed in 1915 and released on February 29, 1920 in the United States. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1920 films Category:American silent feature films Category:Lost American films Category:Films directed by John Francis Dillon Category:Films based on Canadian novels Category:Films based on works by Gilbert Parker Category:American films Category:American film remakes Category:American black-and-white films Category:Metro Pictures films Category:1920 lost films
